Title: P-6 TAIL SECTION
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on Tail section

3.description: Roll 1D: 1-3 = Tailwheel damaged, landing roll -1; 4-6 = Autopilot mechanism inoperable, Bomb Run -2

sub_roll.1-3: Tailwheel damaged - landing roll on Table G-9 -1
sub_roll.4-6: Autopilot mechanism inoperable - Bomb Run on Table O-6 -2

5.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

7.description: Rudder takes 1 hit. With 3 hits rudder is inoperable, landing roll -1

cumulative.effect: Rudder inoperable - landing roll on Tables G-9 or G-10 -1

9.description: Roll 1D: 1,2 = No effect; 3 = Port elevator inoperable; 4 = Starboard elevator inoperable; 5 = Port tailplane root hit; 6 = Starboard tailplane root hit
notes: If both elevators are inoperable, landing rolls -1
If tailplane root accumulates 3 hits, tailplane rips off

10.description: Roll 1D: 1,2 = No effect; 3 = Port elevator inoperable; 4 = Starboard elevator inoperable; 5 = Port tailplane root hit; 6 = Starboard tailplane root hit
notes: If both elevators are inoperable, landing rolls -1
If tailplane root accumulates 3 hits, tailplane rips off

11.description: Roll 1D: 1-5 = 1 oxygen supply hit; 6 = Fire, and Tail oxygen out

sub_roll.6: Fire, and Tail oxygen out - roll to extinguish on Table BL-3

12.description: See effect for roll of 12 on Pilot Compartment Table P-2

notes: a) See rules section Heat Out/Frostbite.
b) If both elevators are inoperable, landing rolls on Tables G-9 and G-10 are -1.

c) If tailplane root accumulates 3 hits during mission, tailplane rips off. If 1 tailplane is off, landing rolls on Tables G-9 and G-10 are -1; if both tailplanes come off, bailout immediately on Table G-7.
d) See rules section Oxygen Out.
